page.title: 05WHITTONSTALL FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: {WHITTONSTALL SCHOOL}STANDS IN THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE AND CATERS FOR CHILDREN AGED 5-9YEARS IN FULL-TIME EDUCATION AND 3-4YEARS IN PART-TIME NURSERY EDUCATION.THERE 29 FULL- TIME PUPILS ON ROLL,AND 9 NURSERY PUPILS.PUPILS WHO DO NOT LIVE IN THE VILLAGE ARE BROUGHT TO SCHOOL IN MINI-BUSES ,SOME LIVE 7 MILES AWAY FROM WHITTONSTALL. THE STAFF OF THE SCHOOL COMPRISES OF TWO FULL-TIME TEACHERS,ONE PART-TIME NURSERY TEACHER, ONE COOK,(meals are cooked on the premises)ONE SUPERVISORY ASSISTANT,ONE CARETAKER,ONE CLERK. THE SCHOOL IS VERY MUCH INVOLVED IN THE COMMUNITY AND MANY OF ITS ACTIVITIES INCLUDE ALL THE INHABITANTS OF WHITTONSTALL AND NEWLANDS.
